legal_basis: Infringement occurs when an act interferes with the monopoly granted by a patent.
patent_validity: The defendants' product infringes claims 1 to 4 of the plaintiffs' patent.
technical_details: The defendants' garments have fur on oppositely facing surfaces, similar to the plaintiffs' patent.
decision_outcome: The defendants were found liable for patent infringement.
cause_of_action: The defendants manufactured fur garments using a method that resulted in a product similar to the plaintiffs' patented fabric.
